results.name: 海岛奇妙物语/Island Uncanny Story

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows@ 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Dou or brtter
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag mayoccur from loading menus or maps. Turn off otherprograms before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows@ 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+GHzProcessor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver supportrequired for WebGL acceleration.(AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag mayoccur from loading menus or maps. Turn off otherprograms before running the game.
